body_html: I've changed the default behavior for output_device. Previously, it defaulted to the device of the input. Now, it defaults to device_ids[0]. I think this is the behavior we want in most cases. For example, we often want the input to be in pinned memory on the CPU, but the output to be on device 0.

body: I've changed the default behavior for `output_device`. Previously, it defaulted to the device of the input. Now, it defaults to `device_ids[0]`. I think this is the behavior we want in most cases. For example, we often want the input to be in pinned memory on the CPU, but the output to be on device 0.
